name: Heroes of the Commonwealth
description:
Heroes of the Commonwealth is a large roleplaying game project of mine that I had been working on for well over a year. It is far from done but this is a combat and campaign Demo of the game.

Even in this early stage there is a lot to explore in the game with dozens of perks and weapons and very tactically deep combat system to explore and master.

The eventual plans for the game were to design a complex character AI that drives the story based on the grudges and desires of a large ensemble cast of npcs. A truly adaptive roleplaying game. It is an unwieldy ambitious project however, and something I can’t afford to pursue at the moment.
